mapper.sql: id, segmentation, ship_id, register_date, update_date, creator, updater, delete_flag
mapper.select: SELECT segmentation FROM t_ship_segmentation t1 LEFT JOIN t_ship_number t2 ON t1.ship_id = t2.id WHERE t2.delete_flag = 0 AND t1.delete_flag = 0 AND t2.ship_number = #{shipNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY segmentation LIMIT #{pageNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT count(*) FROM t_ship_segmentation t1 LEFT JOIN t_ship_number t2 ON t1.ship_id = t2.id WHERE t2.delete_flag = 0 AND t1.delete_flag = 0 AND t2.ship_number = #{shipNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY segmentation
mapper.insert: insert into t_ship_segmentation (id, segmentation, ship_id, register_date, update_date, creator, updater, delete_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{segmentation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id,
segmentation,

mapper.update:
update t_ship_segmentation
segmentation = #{segmentation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ship_id = #{shipId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
register_date = #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_ship_segmentation set segmentation = #{segmentation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship_id = #{shipId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, register_date = #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updater = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
